about_the_game:
Step into a whimsical world where shadows play with light and join Lampy, the adorable little cube, on his quest to find his way home in the game simply called "Lampy."

As you guide Lampy through each level, his warm glow will light up your screen, revealing secrets and surprises along the way. With stunning visuals and a soundtrack that'll tug at your heartstrings, you'll be totally immersed in Lampy's enchanting universe.

"Lampy" isn't just a game; it's an emotional rollercoaster that players of all ages will adore. So, grab your controller and be the hero Lampy needs to navigate through the darkness and find his way home.

Oh, and here's the twist: "Lampy" has tons of levels to conquer! Each one is a new adventure waiting to be explored. But hey, if you ever need a break, don't worry – just remember where you left off, and Lampy will be right there waiting for you to continue the fun. Get ready to light up your gaming world and embark on an unforgettable journey with Lampy! 🌟🎮

name: Lampy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows : 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: intel core 2 duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphique card can handle the game
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any sound card can handle it
  • VR Support: game is not supported for vr
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows : 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphique card can handle the game
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any sound card can handle it
  • VR Support: game is not supported for vr

short_description: Embark on an enchanting journey with "Lampy," a mesmerizing puzzle-platformer that promises universal appeal. Navigate captivating levels, overcome obstacles, and immerse yourself in a world of wonder. Guide Lampy through intricately designed challenges and discover the magic around every corner.
